items.text: punches this back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Powell, no run

items.text: swept fiercely into the deep midwicket fence, on the bounce. This was tossed up, he got underneath it properly before giving it a wallop
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Powell, FOUR runs

items.text: eases this back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Powell, no run

items.text: checks his shot as he punches to midwicket, there's an overthrow at the bowler's end and they take a run.
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Powell, 1 run

items.text: stands tall and bunts this back past the bowler for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Powell, 1 run

items.text: works this from a length outside off towards deep square
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: stretches out and defends back this full delivery.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Powell, no run

items.text: works this slower length delivery to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Powell, no run

items.text: good work by short midwicket to run across and stop this backfoot punch
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Powell, no run

items.text: another cutter, turned to midwicket.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Powell, no run

items.preText: Can West Indies add at least 100 more? These two have batted very sensibly so far. Here's Mustafizur
items.text: slower and fuller, drilled to mid-off.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: wild swing and a miss. Looked to slog this to wide long-on. Fizz angled this full and across.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, no run

items.preText: Maruf can't get Mash's logic: "I do not know why Bangladesh captain is being persistent with Mosaddek. Mash has many other options, this guy is leaking runs. Mahmudullah should get a chance if captain really want to bring some changes to his bowling line. "
items.text: beaten by one that leaves him late. Another cutter that holds onto the surface and beats the edge as he tentatively prods.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, no run

items.text: this time he's beaten on the drive. Once again the cutter, at the moment, he isn't quite reading Fizz off the pitch.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, no run

items.text: stands tall and works this across the line to the bowler himself.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, no run

items.text: looks to steer this behind point, but is beaten by the length. Much fuller than he anticipated. On the bounce to Mushfiqur. Top over that.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, no run

items.text: muscles this pull towards wide long-on, excellent work in the deep.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.text: has he chipped this back? Just short of Mash on his followthrough. Looks to turn the bat face too early as he gets onto his toes, lucky break.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: right on top of the bounce as he turns this length ball to deep square
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.text: right on top of the bounce as he defends this back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: pulled across the line to deep midwicket. Responsible half-century, now to bat through
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: eased into the gap at midwicket, the man coming in from the ropes had a little too much to do.Aggressive running.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Powell, 2 runs

items.text: drills this full delivery to long-on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: right behind the line as he blocks
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, no run

items.text: off a thick outside edge to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, 1 run
